price: 56. Tada Mes prikėlėme jus po jūsų mirties, kad galėtumėte būti dėkingi.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
